oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buell, George Pearson, 1833-1883; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Regimental histories -- Ind. inf. -- 58th; Ramsey, George D., 1802-1882; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Form II, Book and Blank Division, from Ordnance Office, War Department, Washington, D. C., to Colonel George P. Buell, 58th Indiana Volunteers, Department of the Cumberland. "I transmit to your address today, by mail, in compliance with requisition of September 16, 1864, the following Books and Blank Forms. Please acknowledge their receipt on the accompanying Blank." Signed by George D. Ramsey, Brigadier General, Chief of Ordnance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States -- Army -- Ordnance Corps
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Form from the Book and Blank Division of the Ordnance Office of the War Department, Washington, that conveys the numbers and types of forms used by the military for property accountability, money accountability, miscellaneous, personnel, materiel, and inspection. Sent to Colonel George P. Buell, 58th Indiana Volunteers, Commanding Pontoon Train, Department of the Cumberland, as verification of a shipment.
